name: parts storage room
description: This is a room filled with all mater of parts and suplies.  You explore this area for some time when alas you come across something that makes you jump for joy.  It is a shiny pebble.  You run to it and pick it up then hurry and place it in your pocket for safe keeping.  Then you look for a way to escape this room.  There is only one exit and that is to the southeast.

exits.description: There is nothing in this direction except more parts and supplies.
